Class NotificationViewController

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.masterController.NotificationViewControllerMaster
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.manager.NotificationViewController
public class NotificationViewController extends NotificationViewControllerMaster
Controller class for managing the notification view in the manager role. Extends the NotificationViewControllerMaster to provide specific functionality for the manager role.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the necessary configurations. Logs the initialization process and handles any errors that occur.
      Overrides:
      initialize in class NotificationViewControllerMaster

    • load

      protected void load()
      Loads the notification view content. Hides the shuttle column in the table for the manager role.
      Specified by:
      load in class NotificationViewControllerMaster

    • setupTableErstellenContent

      protected void setupTableErstellenContent()
      Sets up the content for the "Erstellen" table. This method is intended to be overridden with specific logic for populating the table.
      Specified by:
      setupTableErstellenContent in class NotificationViewControllerMaster
